website_summaries.verdict: Fun little speaker that provides Bluetooth connectivity, a waterproof design, and a long battery life of 12 hours.
pros: Available in black, blue, red, and gray
Can use a daisy-chain connection with these speakers to connect more than one
Speaker delivers a high level of performance either indoors or outdoors
Works over a wireless Bluetooth or NFC connection
cons: Volume level drops significantly when battery is at one-quarter power

customer_reviews.title: Changer my review.
customer_reviews.text: "Update"...I got this speak in 2017, speaker was working great then..blown speaker...and I'm not a bass head...so this thing does not stand the test of time. Really really disappointed......next...Battery life not great when the batteries get down to the 25% the volume will drops really low. Plus you can't just plug the power cord in it and turn the volume up, no it must recharge above 50%....So keep your speaker charged above 25%...Or just don't buy... Now this thing is just a door stop.
customer_reviews.author: Blackipods

customer_reviews.title: Speakers sound great but....
customer_reviews.text: Speakers sound great and as an individual, they are good. However, I bought them for the house and the party chain feature. Can not get them to work as a 'chain'! Either one is cutting out, one stops working, they're not in sync, or both are glitching....very frustrating! And yes, we've tried the reset button and all the other suggestions on here but just doesn't seem to like to link together.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blue tooth speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker since September and absolutely love it. It has great sound and the battery life is fantastic...a lot longer than I would have expected. I have been primarily using it in the kitchen. It will be great for travel and outside on our deck. I personally like the flashing lights. It doesn't distract me or bother me. Most of the time I don't even think about it but when I do catch a glimpse it seems like a nice little extra. I am so glad I picked this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperB

customer_reviews.title: The speaker stopped working 3 months after purchase date. ...
customer_reviews.text: The speaker stopped working 3 months after purchase date. Contacted Amazon who notified me that I would have to deal with the manufacturer since it was after the return window. Not sure how things will go once I contact Sony I will keep my review updated **********update Sony sent me a $20 credit towards the purchase of a new speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Ilysa Kirk

customer_reviews.title: My favorite speaker so far
customer_reviews.text: My favorite speaker so far! I have been looking for a Bluetooth speaker I will be able to listen to music in many different places: bathroom, bedroom, the beach, and other open areas open to the public. I wanted something that is not too expensive but also had good quality. Therefore, I went to BestBuy to look at the right speaker. In the beginning, I was interested in the JBL 3, but after listening to both speakers, I couldn't choose the JBL over the Sony. Sony’s bass, quality, and overall look were better in every way. Plus it ways cheaper. That’s why I chose Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Alex T.

customer_reviews.title: Really happy; would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sounds ridiculously great for the size. Lots of bass. Portability is wonderful. Feels great in your hand. Battery lasts a long time. Price is great. Really love the controls and the phone integration - I can use Google Assistant and make phone calls on this speaker! Splashproof is icing on this delicious cake. Cons: The controls are a little confusing, like how to move forward or back a track. The flashing lights are dumb and pointless. I highly recommend this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I had already purchased another SRS-XB20 last year after comparing bluetooth speakers at Best Buy. I liked the sound quality so much that I wanted to buy another one to use as my PC speaker(s). New ones are around $100 so I decided to try a used one. I'm glad I did! It was in perfect condition, looks and operates as if new. Battery life isn't the greatest on the SRS-XB20, but if you turn the lighting off, it operates longer. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very good speaker
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is super good, but not the best. Yeah, during 2017 I thought it was the best but after 2 years better speakers came out, currently I'm trying to get Sony's latest speakers but this speaker specifically after 2 years, it gets weird... the speaker starts failing, when playing music loud the speaker blows out for some odd reason I can't connect it after many attempts. I don't feel like going much in detail but like every great thing, it starts going bad after several years... But I have dropped my speaker a lot, so if you probably take care of it a lot, then your speaker should last longer than 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Ok speaker, short life span.
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok bluetooth speaker. I've had mine for about 2 years, and it has been used rather gently. I mostly use it to have music in the bathroom. The sound isn't great, but it's good when you keep it at low to mid levels of volume. As others have mentioned, the bass is best at low volume levels. I've only had one issue, the speaker developed a tendency to randomly shut off by itself. It's never even been splashed by water, so I don't know what's been causing this issue. We have Bose units that have been going strong for over 5 years, and we expected the same quality from Sony.
customer_reviews.author: ArcticSnow

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at low and high volume
customer_reviews.text: The item I purchased was refurbished. However, I didn't find any flaw with the product. What I like most about this product is the sound. The bass from the small speaker is amazing. It clearly makes a difference but not overpowering the music. Vocals and instruments both sound great. Most speaker suffer loss of bass at low volume but not this speaker. It seems Sony audio processor well calibrate the bass compensation at low volume. The only thing I wish it could improve is to shut off the power when there is no input. Once I left the bluetooth connection on without playing music. The battery was completed drained after a day.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Pep

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, awesome speaker! Great job Sony!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has been absolutely amazing since I've had it. Got it for black friday for a really great price. The sound quality is amazing and very loud! Definitely would recommend this over a beats pill or jbl speaker. Those may be nice too, but they're so overpriced because of the brand name. Sony did a great job with this speaker and the light around the speaker is a cool bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: The deep rich tone you get is clear and great for many types of music
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat the value of this Sony speaker. Mind boggling sound from such a small speaker. The deep rich tone you get is clear and great for many types of music. If you download the app you can adjust the equalizer to your style. Extremely lightweight and portable. Not sure about the battery life yet as we haven't spent enough time to drain it completely. The build quality is actually quite impressive for a speaker in the $50 price range. I like the smooth silicone shell feeling and the flashing light effects. We also ordered the xb30 and both speakers are just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: ChauffeurA.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Look Substantive Sound
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. Bought it for my office. The sound quality is substantive and the extra bass makes all the difference. Looks gorgeous and sublime on my industrial desk. No complains whatsoever. Love that it is a Sony and very affordable. Getting one for my son's room!
customer_reviews.author: Pokemon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Pair (Intuitively) with Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as my Bose Mini, but considering it costs 20% of what I paid for the Bose the sound is darn good. However, Bluetooth won't pair with my laptop, and I see from the reviews others have had this problem. It installed initially but won't play. Paired with phone in a snap. UPDATE: Figured out the pairing. Because this can both play music or be a VOIP phone speaker, you have to designate which you want in your laptop. I went to Control Panel/Devices and Printers , selected the speaker which was installed, and then checked the box for music device (or unclicked VOIP speaker box) and success!
customer_reviews.author: ArtemisShopper

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is lacklustre, battery life is poor, and worst of all the speaker keeps interrupting your music to nag you to charge when the battery is at 25% or lower. The speaker also automatically lowers its volume at 50% battery to save power which is just dumb. I got so frustrated with this speaker that I ended up buying a JBL Flip 4 instead which is much better in every single way.
customer_reviews.author: Hank C.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly... for awhile.
customer_reviews.text: This worked amazingly for about 6 months but by month 5 it would just randomly shut off when you try to play it anywhere near max volume still not sure if that was only if the battery was low or what the issue was but now it just wont connect to my phone anymore via bluetooth after randomly shutting off again. not sure if this is a problem with these or just my speaker but i loved this product until these problems came up. I recommend it if these arnt recurring problems and its just my unit.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Vogt

customer_reviews.title: I decided to get the Sony for $48 on Black Friday and could not be happier. Product gets much louder then I expected and ...
customer_reviews.text: Could not decide between Flip 4 (JBL) and the Sony XB20, I decided to get the Sony for $48 on Black Friday and could not be happier. Product gets much louder then I expected and feels and sounds like a truly premium speaker. I can not imagine another speaker that gets louder at this size. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Spooner

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but poor mechanics
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great for the size but battery life is pretty disappointing at about 5 hours on normal use. Bluetooth is horrible at times. I’ve gone hours without interruption and I’ve also had it cut out every 45 seconds. The Sony pairing is also very poor. I found that one speaker would play out of tune by a millisecond which is very noticeable and completely ruins the song. Overall this speaker sounds really good and the bass is accurate but the Bluetooth connectivity is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Burkeley

customer_reviews.title: Love sony audio products
customer_reviews.text: Love sony audio products. This thing sounds great, and has pretty decent bass. Nothing to rattle your brain but you definitely know it's there. It also gets really loud with little noticeable distortion. I use it mostly inside, but it's also loud enough to use in up armored military vehicles at highway speed. Have accidentally splashed water on it several times with no issues. Looking to get a second speaker for the stereo capability.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous sound, good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, especially with the extra bass. I have an old pickup truck that has only cassette player, and I use this speaker with an MP3 player, and the sound is incredible. The battery life seems to be about accurate according to the estimates given. I got two to use with my computer, and the stereo works very well. I'm very happy with these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: pippalouTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound, Little Price!
customer_reviews.text: Stellar bang for the buck. I needed a sound system to throw in a backpack and take with my son and I for a 2 month European trip. I saw great comparative reviews and for the price this holds its own with Bose but for 1/3 the price. It has great sound and holds it's juice for quite awhile. We got the lighter color for the beach and sun in hopes it would deflect sun a bit. Super nice purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Poor Bluetooth Connectivity Makes It Unusable
customer_reviews.text: No issues with the speaker for the first 4 months. Then the BlueTooth connectivity got really bad. I used to keep it about 10 ft away on a shelf. Now, even with it right next to my laptop it has very poor audio that is so choppy I can hardly use it anymore. I even experimented with turning off all other bluetooth things and it made no difference. I also connected it via BT to other devices, same results. Will never buy SONY again, the cheaper products actually work better.
customer_reviews.author: Douche McGavin

customer_reviews.title: I just received my speaker and so far i love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my speaker and so far i love it!! I purchased this speaker after getting my bose soundlink speaker stolen and did not want to spend as much on another speaker so i tried this one. The sound quality is great and it is very loud. It was a great replacement at a much better price. I really like the lights that go to the music. If I was trying to spend a little more money I definitely would have gotten the XB30 because this one is so great i'm sure that ones even louder but for what I wanted to spend this was the best move! 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Muffled, head-in-a-bucket sound
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why everyone else seems to like this speaker so much, but I hate it. Even on "low bass" it has a muffled, distorted sound. I like to listen to commentary via podcasts and such. This speaker is very ill suited for voice and there is now way to adjust the tone for better sound. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ned D Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Died a few days after return period!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Feb 24th and was very impressed with it! Great bass and very impressive for such a small speaker. Then a couple of days ago it wouldn't connect with my wireless and I tried the reset button several times and it still wouldn't connect. I then tried to attach it to my phone and PC via audio cable and both sort of worked but sounded like they had a short in them. So basically it worked great for almost 3 months but died just after the return period so my opinion is less than one star and I suppose I'll toss it in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing bass, look elsewhere for a party speaker
customer_reviews.text: The mids and highs of this speaker are decent, making it a good speaker for listening to folk or acoustic music at mid-level volume. However, the "extra bass" is a joke, with little to no sub bass body or presence in the mix. You'll hear punchy kicks (mid-lows) but you won't be able to make out bass lines well at all, especially at high volume where the treble becomes pretty overbearing. Without the "extra bass" enabled this speaker sounds very thin and tinny. If you are looking for a speaker for parties/EDM or pop music, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: mattcav

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds so incredible for it's size that I decided to purchase a second one to create a "stereo pair" that sounds AMAZING!!! Sony really scored big time with the invention of this bluetooth speaker. Great bass, vocals, and treble that I look at them wondering how they did it. I know LDAC (which doubles the reception of the signal) is the way that creates such superb music output coupled with the digital amp, and affordable price (compared to Bose and Beats) puts this at the top of bluetooth speakers to own!
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: O.k. I turned effect lights off and cranked up the volume to maximum, repeated this twice and got 2 hours and 15 minutes runtime both times before it automatically went to half volume !, so that's awesome runtime for a Bluetooth speaker,, and it sounds awesome ! I have the 2 speaker s set to stereo, left channel and right channel,, surround sound 🤙🤘
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money for quality!
customer_reviews.text: Had several bluetooth speakers. Don't waste your money of them. Buy once. Get name brand quality music at a good price one time with this speaker. Only regrets is I wish I would have purchase this one first. Could have saved myself lots of money and hassle returning all the others.
customer_reviews.author: bryan whitley

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly small but AMAZING sound.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase. I got this so I can play motivating music for my soccer boys while we do agility drills outdoors. The sound is VERY goos! We’ve also used this on the beach and it is perfect. So small and easy to pack it can fit in your purse but sounds like a massive speaker when you turn it on. Love it. You’ll love the extra bass function as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christina P.

customer_reviews.title: Sound /durability
customer_reviews.text: I take this to work in plant nursery, beach, boating. Lots of water and sand/dirt. It's loud and sounds good. We have 3 Bluetooth speakers(this one and 2 bose color links. No one has a preference except my 15yo son who says this one is easier to connect to. In a teen world LOUD and SOUND trump all else. When outside I can't tell the difference between this one and my Bose. Entire family loves it. I battle with My teen son who takes this one daily and forgets to put it back on charger! Charges quickly and lasts a long time with skipping to his songs.
customer_reviews.author: ebSMITH

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: I like this speaker. The sound quality is clearer than my aging Denon Mini, but this one is a little bigger, not as easy to carry around, and lacks IPX7. I'm still looking for the perfect speaker; I prefer this one for listening around the house, and the Denon for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Moreno II

customer_reviews.title: Seems a decent rival to Bose
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, and I got it for a much cheaper price than found at other stores. I have a more expensive Bose bluetooth speaker, and this speaker is comparable in sound and quality. The light up feature is a fun effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging.
customer_reviews.text: I did enjoyed the sound quality and all the advertized features. Problem is, 7 months of light use and the speaker won't charge. Changed cables, ports, charger. Nothing works. Reset button didn't solve the problem either. So now I have a very expensive paper weight. Sony used to make long lasting and solid products. Now may be time to try new electronic brands at a better price and long lasting quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: This speaker works perfect for her - easy to setup and volume plenty ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my Sister-we play musical instruments, she could not hear my bass on iPhone speaker. This speaker works perfect for her - easy to setup and volume plenty for me to virtually be there when her band plays. She is also enjoying it in the car for speakerphone, listening to podcasts, books and music - the clarity with increased volume makes a large improvement over iPhone and radio speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Ozslotguy

customer_reviews.title: Can feel the BASE!
customer_reviews.text: This takes the music from our Smart Phone & turns it into a quality of sound that we used to have to have a full set of speakers for. The Base sound is amazing. You can feel it. The other day, I used it when we called a friend of my husband's. I called him on our Smart Phone & it amplified through this little speaker. Everyone in the room could hear & talk. Easy to turn up the sound for my husband, who has hearing "issues".
customer_reviews.author: short sandy

customer_reviews.title: It sounds good, it's MUCH louder than either of us expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife who likes to blast music from her phone while doing things around the house. It sounds good, it's MUCH louder than either of us expected, and it feels really solid. Plus, my wife is happy, so that's a win.
customer_reviews.author: B. T. Odell

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I have 3 of these and one each of the XB30 and XB40. I gave one to my wife...she loves it and shares it with the grandkids when they are here. I have one I leave at work and one in my office at home I use all over the house. We use them mostly with our IPADS.
customer_reviews.author: adrenaline junky

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found A Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I found a keeper! This is the best of the small speakers in regards to bass response and a well balanced overall sound. It can get very loud though I prefer a more modest level. It's not quite a Bose Mini Soundlink but it holds it's own at a third of the price. The grey model is very attrractive in design and function. Spend a little more and get something decent. The Sony will fill the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Mavric00

customer_reviews.title: Good deep sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for myself 1 year ago, I liked it enough that I bought it as a gift for a 23 year old nephew, and bought another one for an 18yr old nephew, and also another for an18yr old girl who is friend of the family. All liked it, so it must be good. Both of the 18yrs old said it was their best graduation gift.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great price on the blue one
customer_reviews.text: This is my second SB20. Saw the blue one for a lot less than I paid for my grey one and had to have it. Don't know why the blue is more than 30% less than the other colors. I was concerned that it might be a refurb but it appears to be brand new. Now I can have stereo .
customer_reviews.author: Mike Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: After much researching wireless speakers, I decided to go with this one as I didn't want to break the bank. I bought it for my husband's birthday and he loves it! He's always listening to music on his headphones around the house and in the shower, so I figured he'd enjoy this. It has great sound, easy Bluetooth connectivity, and charging is a breeze. It alerts you when the battery is low and needs charging and I love the light illumination. It packs a great sound into a small and portable speaker. I was very impressed and so was my hubby!
customer_reviews.author: TheresaMichelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound for a small sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for a small sound bar. Very nice quality as well. It has a good weight to it and the buttons all feel nice and solid. It paired flawlessly with my phone and works as designed. My only small annoyance is the lights on the front. They blink/flash in a weird pattern which makes it distracting. Thankfully, Sony made it easy to turn the lights off - you just hold the bass button for 3 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hines

customer_reviews.title: Best value!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Sounds Great! Looks good, feels good. I was convinced to buy this by Matt Granger's Best Bluetooth Speakers - 2017 Buying Guide on Youtube. It also has enough volume range to be loud with the wimpy output from my Moto G3 headphone jack. I got it used (but like new) for $40 - best value!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wireless portable speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for a small portable speaker. I love how crisp it sounds and the bass is just right. I don't even need to use the extra bass button even though that's an added plus. I was impressed by the sound of this little unit and I enjoy the colored line light. It was easy to set up and easy to pair too. This speaker does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound quality. Decent volume and base. Bought it to listen to audiobooks and music in my house but have discovered it's an amazing little sound system for movies/amazon prime too :) the app is kinda lame though and you have to use it to adjust some settings like the lights. Eh, whatever though. Does what I want it too.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tin sound. Not like past units at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in June. Did not use until Oct 24, when moved to new home. Have used 2 prior units of the same model. They were so great I wanted 1 of my own. This unit is terrible. Treble sounds like tin and the words unclear. Extrbass is okay but not usable as I cannot understand the words if it is on. This is soo very maddening and a huge waste of my income!!
customer_reviews.author: 3c

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and Priced Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this product has great bass sound and clarity for the price! I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a small portable speaker with great sound. I should have purchased this one instead of my other larger Sony speaker for $80.00 more.
customer_reviews.author: Mona L. Settle

customer_reviews.title: I could not get it to blu-tooth to my Galaxy ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not get it to blu-tooth to my Galaxy note Decided to you direct line to the phone but after three months it quit working. Also a lot of static noise. I tried to bluetooth it to some other phones but no luck. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Wright8750

customer_reviews.title: Go for it !
customer_reviews.text: I did an extensive research before buying this product. I was even ready to spend $200 on Bose's product. But you gotta think about the necessity of this product in your life. Where do you want to use the speaker ? In your bedroom, in parties, in the bathroom ? I am not a party person. I am in my late 20s and I enjoy listening music with my wife at my home. This speaker produces pleasant sound and it's aesthetically beautiful. Worth spending 50 bucks on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ripon

customer_reviews.title: Falling in love with Sony again
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. I am in love with it already. High quality material. Nice sound. Looks beautiful, sitting on my shelf. Who said Sony's days are over?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker does exactly what I want it to do! I was a little unsure but it really kicks out a good sound for what I want. Listening to Billie Eilish & the bass is pretty decent considering it's such a small speaker! So far so good!!
customer_reviews.author: carol szychulski

customer_reviews.title: Impressive sound.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the sound of this little unit. It's not a replacement for a 200W stereo system, but it's nice to put on a table and play music from your phone or computer tablet. It was easy to set up and easy to pair. The main drawback is that you can't charge and play at the same time. The play/pause button didn't work with Windows, but it it did with iOS.
customer_reviews.author: LastGas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is pretty amazing. It puts out great sound and you can even pair additional speakers to it. Would recommend this if you are after a bluetooth speaker. The battery lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It's Koo
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Don't really understand a feature were, if it's running on wall outlet/plugged in power after a while (maybe months) the volume will be drastically decreased and you'll have to turn it off and charge the battery for the volume to return to normal. Makes sense if it's on battery power though.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great little Bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little speaker with excellent bass and very clear sound. I use it during my daily workouts, and the battery lasts for hours. I only recharge it about every two weeks or so. I compared it to several similar size speakers, including the very expensive Bose, and it sounds every bit as good if not better to me.
customer_reviews.author: Bill A

customer_reviews.title: Early delivery of a well made product
customer_reviews.text: Seller was extraordinary. As a refurbish, it was in excellent shape for the price. Seller beat the assigned delivery by almost a week. Packaging was adequate and all parts were enclosed. I like this speaker for size and quality. It works with Sony music center and can control volume from the app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My fiancee is a music fanatic. Pandora follows him ...
customer_reviews.text: My fiancee is a music fanatic. Pandora follows him everywhere he goes. This speaker was exactly what he was looking for. The quality of sound is remarkable and is portable enough for him to carry to work, to the gym, to listen to while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for such a powerful little speaker
customer_reviews.text: One of the best bluetooth speakers I've ever bought. Very loud for being considered a "small" speaker. Sound is great, mid levels and bass are what shine through. The lights that go with the music are also a nice plus. For 68 bucks, best money I've ever spent on a 100 dollar speaker. If you need a bluetooth speaker, this is definitely the way to go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Accessory Speaker
customer_reviews.text: My first Bluetooth device and I could not be more pleased. I have never been comfortable with devices such as this and is the reason I put off the purchase for years. Pairing the device to my laptop and iPod was simple. The sound quality is amazing and room filling. My son prefers the sound quality of this Sony speaker to his Bluetooth JBL speaker (model unknown). Portability is good and I find myself taking the device camping or on various road trips. It also charges via a mico-usb cord from a car charger or phone charger which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: EdKumi

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: The size makes portability great, the sound quality is real real good and only increases if you make it a pair and get some left-right action goin on, which is why I bought another. Baterry life is, well probly quite good for how much I use these suckers, but it seems to go from 50-0 fast, but again that could be my constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Nombre

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is great for such a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great for such a small speaker. I love bluetooth connectivity as I can place it anywhere in the house. My favorite thing about this speaker is that I have the capability of connecting more speakers to add stereo sound.
customer_reviews.author: WendyM

customer_reviews.title: I am absolutely happy with the sound
customer_reviews.text: Well, i was waiting for this sound link for a long time, reading the reviews in order to decide which one to buy and finally order and receive my SONY XB-20. I am absolutely happy with the sound, only with extra bass button is on, the quality of the sound is perfect for this speaker. The only thing i have notice during the listening the music through the Bluetooth is the speaker has lost connection with Bluetooth a couple of times. But overall i am happy. Nice for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Olesya N.

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound and connectivity. Excellent looking so a fantastic paperweight.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker sounded awful and was not very good at connecting via bluetooth. It looked fantastic when playing visually but the important part of sound and connectivity was not there for a speaker like this, even at half price. I wouldn't pay $10 for the product I received.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bigley

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the other ones when you account for the size
customer_reviews.text: I already had the xb40 and this is pretty much just a way smaller more portable version. It’s got less boom and less battery life but it’s also 1/4 the weight of the bigger ones and is a way smaller form factor.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Battery Sucks!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a college student, this speaker is NOT crowd approved. The battery sucks! Purchased the speaker 2 years ago, I’ve been having issues with the battery since then, whereas the speaker shuts off itself when playing music full volume (even fully charged). And the battery life only last about 8 hours. So think carefully before buying. The sound quality is okay, and the bass is exceptional. If you’re looking for better battery life, sound quality overall, definitely go up a notch and get a bigger, more expensive speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher.Xu

customer_reviews.title: Good for the first 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great for about the first 3 months. Then the battery life starts to drain substantially, and the connectivity drops time and again. Also one of the speakers will randomly turn off sound and wont play anything through it. If you put it over a certain volume the speaker will shut off. It gets rougher the longer you take it out for. I would highly recommend getting the warranty or searching for something else. This product is solid for a while but then the use drops off.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Love using this speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Just got the Sony XB20 yesterday and I must say I really do love using this thing quality is good the extra bass feature works as it should and the lights are cool just make sure you download the app to get the most out of the device.
customer_reviews.author: kennywolfe

customer_reviews.title: Wheres the bass! haha
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker! I would rather not have the extra bass button because it does not get an extra bass. The extra bass button made me assume it had some nice bass. It doesnt Sooo if you didnt have that button then i wouldnt assume Heh Still love my sony though!
customer_reviews.author: Paolo

customer_reviews.title: Sound of A
customer_reviews.text: I have Iphone 7, I had to down load Sony Music center in order for bluetooth to work. It is a pretty decent sounding speaker with extra bass. If you wanted to spend more money on investing Como audio that is a good loud device for web radio,etc If you have space for it.
customer_reviews.author: snowdog

customer_reviews.title: Big sound in a little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has a big clear sound. I was surprised at how loud it is. Great for parties on the back patio. It is also tough and the batter lasts a long time on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: Kamilah T.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great. Love the colored light that flashes to the beat of the music. Gets pretty loud which is great if you want to annoy your upstairs neighbor and beats pounding on the ceiling. 😜 Would be great if you can keep it plugged in to charge but only charges when not playing music
customer_reviews.author: Scott Morawsky

customer_reviews.title: Sony XB20 Portable Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: It arrived early, very nice! I love it's small size and BIG sound, plus the battery lasts a long time. I would definitely order this again and highly recommend it and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Cautious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This little portable speaker packs quite a punch with clean sound. I unpacked it, pressed the power button for 3 seconds, turned on the bluetooth on my phone and it paired right up. One thing that annoying was the lack of an actual users manual. The only that is included is a pictograph. I am aure there is something online.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelR

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great for almost all genres.
customer_reviews.text: I had this speaker for a while and I am so impressed with the sound quality! It’s clear but packs a punch. Unfortunately the lights stop working and it has trouble paring sometimes. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando J.

customer_reviews.title: Good Speaker for price, but needs EQ!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good speaker for the price which was $48. I wish the Sony XB 20 SongPal application for iOS included an equalizer for the XB 20. Right now, all you can control is turning the extra bass on and off. The XB30 and XB40 have access to the equalizer, but the XB20 doesn't. Hopefully soon Sony will activate it for the XB20. Besides the lack of an EQ, the speaker works well.
customer_reviews.author: dfine1966

customer_reviews.title: Best sounding portable speaker I've own and likely-hood be my last!
customer_reviews.text: I am so, please with my portable speaker it gets used more than any of my others that I own... the sound is great, nice and loud.... has a nice battery life also, as for connectivity it is ok, could use a little work there like the distance before it drops connection...
customer_reviews.author: Sidney J. Forestier

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker. Very portable. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo and I use it to listen to music to dance to. We have a small condo probably 600sqft in each floor so the speaker was loud enough. The bass is really nice. I also listen to some vocal music like Bossa nova. Never any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: S Chen

customer_reviews.title: ... on a daily special and the sound quality is excellent. Pairing is easy
customer_reviews.text: Caught this on a daily special and the sound quality is excellent. Pairing is easy. Light is cool if your into that. I like that it is heavy and feels well built, I know that aids in the nice bass it produces. I also own and iHome and another brand. I ordered a Bose before this and sent it back because I was unimpressed, but this one did the trick. By looking at the specs, I don't see where the newer version is worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: V. Verges

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The return window has closed on this (5/4/18). Both speakers stopped working at the same time. I have the same speaker in Black that I have had for over a year and works great. Seems funny that these new ones both went bad at the same time. They will not pair, lights do not go on when charging and one isn't holding a charge...
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Stem

customer_reviews.title: I think I got one of the last ones!
customer_reviews.text: This is a older version which is SUPERIOR to the newer version. Bass is AMAZING and the sound and battery life is great. I have this version now for almost 4 years... I wanted to get a new one JUST TO HAVE in case I cant find it again ( seems like its on its way to be discontinued.. so I think I got the last one! )
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. So easy to set up. The sound is absolutely awesome, hard to realize it comes from such a small electronic device. Came very quickly. I recommend for those who want really good sound from their cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: Mama D

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery in unit I received does not perform as advertised. Max use after full night of charging is 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: txmed7

customer_reviews.title: Highly underappreciated
customer_reviews.text: Got a refurbished one for 35$. Sounds way better than what I got it for. Buttons are crisp, has a nice heft to it, full, room filling sound and pretty decent battery life. Doesn't come with an adapter though, just the cord. Rubber feet make sure the bass doesn't make it bounce around. The lights, damn I might get epilepsy but its effin worth it. LOVE 'EM! *get the blue if you like the color, even its slightly more expensive*
customer_reviews.author: Abhimanyu Sarin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and you can pair them together, it’s super easy if you look at the instuctions (they are pictured witch helps if you aren’t good with technology) if you turn both on at the same time (after paired once) they auto connect to them selfs than auto connect to the last device to be connected (if its nearby and on)
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Salty

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker. 3hr batt. Feels solid. Not cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. I use it daily. The battery lasts about 3 hours but I keep it plugged in almost all the time. Sou ds great and is durable. Feels like it's very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Butler

customer_reviews.title: Gifted to my mom.
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves this speaker that I bought for her. I have listened and the sound quality is great. It is easy to connect and use while giving off great sound that can be played pretty loud.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie T

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this instead of the new JBL speaker and have to say I love it! Very easy to use and the sound quality is awesome! Was very impressed for the price. The lights are a nice added touch. Sound is loud and clear. Would def buy again!
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last a year!
customer_reviews.text: Bought June 2017; was working well, my iPhone paired instantly with no problems until today...it’s completely out and I have tried everything in troubleshooting per the SONY website.
customer_reviews.author: joe hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Compact and well-made speaker. The matte finish feels very ...
customer_reviews.text: Compact and well-made speaker. The matte finish feels very premium. Above all, the sound is very rich in bass and volume. Exceptional product at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Bean D.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best wireless speaker EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound quality! Much louder than most of the others and at a lot less. Sony has always been known for quality and this speaker proves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Clean, full sound with great bass.  Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Very powerful. Nice bass, very full sound, clean. Fills a large room. My wife is using in her office about 25 feet away from my office and we're both really enjoying it. Best portable Bluetooth I've tried...and I've tried many.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: pretty loud for such a small system
customer_reviews.text: pretty loud for such a small system, crisp and clear too. bass is decent, priced a little high in my opinion though. range - I have yet to go far enough for the Sony to loose signal from my phone while listening to music - so you get good range too. Battery life - I would give 3.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds almost great. For a little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Sounds almost great. For a little speaker, it actually does sound great and puts out more sound and power than you'd assume. Friend of mine had one and I had to get one also because for being little, it does sound like a big speaker.
customer_reviews.author: rejinald

customer_reviews.title: It is the best in the market
customer_reviews.text: It is one of the most amazing speaker this is the life of the party I love it everyone is amazed where that I get it but I don't want to tell no one but it is awesome listens great wonderful base I just love it
customer_reviews.author: jose pimentel jr

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for me, plenty of bass and all other frequency ranges too.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for me, plenty of bass and all other frequency ranges. I listen to rock mostly and I like my bass balanced to the rest of the music in a song and this does that from low volume to cranked up.
customer_reviews.author: kenlive2001

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: It's worth the money. I bought one used-like new. It came in proper packaging, no defects at all. The extra bass option is great. It has its own app which isn't necessary to me, but it's cool. The only con is having to press the play button a certain amount of times to skip, go to the previous song, or start the song over. So I just us my phone which is obviously easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in lightweight  structure.
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic. I use it at hand at church when either I sing or the youth group sings. Bought refurbished and then ordered another to give to my teenage son.
customer_reviews.author: Speed Reader

customer_reviews.title: Such great sound for the size / price
customer_reviews.text: Found the high reviews for this affordable Bluetooth speaker and decided to take a chance. Did not disappoint. Great sound and quality.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: My daughter love this product
customer_reviews.text: Thank you this product is absolutely what you guys said it would be I'm very disappointed in a JBL I just received wish I would have gone back with you guys
customer_reviews.author: Erika Alexander

product_meta.title: Sony XB20 Portable Wireless Speaker with Bluetooth, Red
product_meta.description: Color:RedLiven up the party anywhere with this portable Bluetooth speaker with extra bass and stylish lighting—all in a water-resistant design for worry-free listening indoors or out3. Connect and synchronize up to 10 speakers together for a real show and keep things rocking with up to 12 hours of battery Life4. It's ready to party. NFC: yes; Input Output Terminals: micro USB, Stereo Mini Jack (IN)
feature_bullets: Feel the power of EXTRA BASS
Connect and stream music easily with Bluetooth and NFC, plus LDAC
Add a splash of colored light with a single-colored line light
Connect and add more speakers with Wireless Party Chain
Add an extra speaker for stereo sound
Water-resistant design for worry-free listening indoors or out
Listen all day or night with up 12 hours of battery life
Pick it up and play with the small, lightweight design

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,244 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
